offline: Take Entry Offline | Take Entries Offline
noLinkEntriesSubtext: You can not attach any more Entries, since there are no more entries available or all existing entries are already attached.
noEntriesMainSubtext: Click 'New' to create your first Entry.
noEntriesFormSubtext: Fill in a title and click 'Save' to create your first Entry.
notAvailable: Unfortunately the application "Portfolio" is currently not available.

form-view.notFoundSubtext: The requested Entry with ID "{id}" does not exist.
form-view.licenseText: for which the license should be set
form-view.publishText: for which to change the release state
form-view.licenseSubtext: The license of the selected files will be changed.
form-view.publishSubtext: These files will be cleared for or withheld from publication respectively.
form-view.deleteLinkedSubtext: The Link to these Entries will be deleted.

notify.selfLinked: Entries can not be attached to themselves.
notify.saveBeforeLink: Please save the current entry first.
notify.formDataNotFound: Unfortunately the form can not be displayed. Please try to refresh the page.
notify.entryTypeNotFound:
Unfortunately the form for {type} was not found.
Please select a different type.
notify.entryFetchFailSub:
Unfortunately there was a problem and we could not fetch the data.
Please try to refresh the page.
notify.entryFetchFailTypes: Something went wrong while fetching the entries and information displayed might not be complete.
notify.saveSuccessSubtext: The entry "{title}" was successfully saved to the database.
notify.addTitle: Please specify a title in order to save!
notify.specifyTitleBeforeLinking: Please specify a title for this entry first.
notify.entryActionText: Do you really want to {action} this entry? | Do you really want to {action} these entries?
notify.unsavedChangesText: You have unsaved changes. Should they be saved?
notify.fetchSingleEntry: The selected entry could not be fetched from the database.
notify.actionFailSubtext: Unfortunately these {type} could not be {action}: | Unfortunately one {type} could not be {action} | Unfortunately {count} {type} could not be {action}.
notify.linkToParentFail: Linking with entry "{title}" failed! Please try to link manually.
notify.fetchMediaFail: Unfortunately the files attached to this entry could not be loaded.
notify.fetchLinkedFail: Unfortunately the list of linked entries could not be updated.
notify.quotaExceeded: Unfortunately files could not be uploaded, because you exceeded your user quota. Please free some space in order to upload.
notify.notSupported: Unfortunately display of this file type is currently not supported.
notify.notConverted: Please wait until the file was converted.
notify.userQuotaUpdate: The available user space could not be updated and might be displayed incorrectly.
notify.parentsAlready: The following entry could not be attached, because it is already a parent of the current entry | The following entries could not be attached, because they are already parents of the current entry

upload.title: File Upload
upload.quotaExceeded: Unfortunately you exceeded your quota, because you have only {space} of space left. Please remove some files to enable uploading.
